meanings.definition: A small coin of Malaysia and Indonesia.
meanings.sent1: I found a duit on the street.
meanings.sent2: She collected duit from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The duit rolled away and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The duit shone like a tiny sun in the palm of his hand.
meanings.sent5: The duit was so small, it was easy to lose in the grass.

meanings.sent1: He needed more duit to buy the toy.
meanings.sent2: She saved up all her duit for a rainy day.
meanings.sent3: The duit seemed to disappear whenever he tried to save it.
meanings.sent4: Her duit was like a magic key that could open any door.
meanings.sent5: The duit jingled happily in his pocket as he walked.
